summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Anti Aging Skin Care Serum for Men & Women From Uptown Cosmeceuticals Offers Spin Trap® Intelligent Antioxidant, Advanced Scientific Formula Promotes Younger Looking Face, 30mL Review Date: 2015/11/18 Store: Uptown Cosmeceuticals Average Rating: 3.4 Product Details: {'Product Benefits': 'Anti-Aging', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Brand': 'Uptown Cosmeceuticals', 'Material Feature': 'Antioxidant', 'Unit Count': '1.0144 Fl Oz', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.6 x 1.7 x 1.7 inches; 0.8 Ounces', 'UPC': '685987989205'} Review Text: Since I received this serum with a great discount I shared this skin care product with my friend , so she could provide her opinion.
She used it for several day and that's what she found out:
1. Nice, presentable packaging and good design.
2. Very pleasant scent (citrus and spring flowers kind) very fresh
3. Hypoallergenic (she has EXTREMELY sensitive skin)
4. Her husband tried it and stated that is helped him with pores
I could add to that that the package arrived very fast and even the full price with the discount is acceptable compare to other serums from the mall. Review Title: Quality product for good price Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: InstaNatural Cellulite Cream - With Caffeine & Retinol - Body Firming Solution & Tightening Lotion for Thigh Area, Buttocks & More - No Wrap Needed - Anti Cellulite Control Treatment - 4 OZ Review Date: 2015/11/27 Store: InstaNatural Product Description: ['Reduce Cellulite and Tighten Your Skin With our Retinol & Caffeine Firming Cream As time progresses, both men and women will experience puckering and dimpling of cellulite in the following areas: - Thighs - Stomachs - Hips - Arms - Chest Our Cellulite Cream is packed with antioxidants and moisturizing ingredients to help improve skin tone and texture: - Specialized REGU-SLIM formula that tones, tightens, and improves the skin - Moisturizes and hydrates skin - Contains Retinol, Caffeine, Jojoba Oil and Vitamin E for supreme nourishment With InstaNatural, rest assured you will receive the best customer care and highest-quality Cellulite Cream around. - Premium blend of natural ingredients - 4 oz jar gives you more value for less expense - Made in the USA - Cruelty-Free'] Average Rating: 3.2 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.2 x 3 x 3.2 inches; 6.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '616913954721 852661007238', 'Manufacturer': 'SETAF'} Review Text: To help this cream to work on my abdomen I also purchased detox tea and a waist trainer. I drink my tea, which helps me to get rid of bloating, I apply my Cellulite Cream, let it absorb, then I Put on my t-shirt and put my waist trainer on top. The waist trainer helps to keep my abdomen warm and triggers the ingredients in a cream (caffeine, retinol, Vitamin C as well as many other ingredients) to star working better. That is my personal suggestion and you can apply it for yourself. I also apply it on my neck 2x day as well.
I received this cream with a discount for trying, testing and reviewing Review Title: Vitamin C as well as many other ingredients) to star working better. That is my personal suggestion and you can ... Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Pure Hyaluronic Acid Serum with Vitamin C for Face - Organic Anti Aging & Anti-Wrinkle Skin Treatment - Penetrates Deeply & Activates Collagen Production for a Younger, Firmer & Brighter Complexion Review Date: 2015/12/03 Store: Derma-nu Miracle Skin Remedies Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Skin Type': 'All', 'Product Benefits': 'Anti-Aging', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Brand': 'Derma-nu Miracle Skin Remedies', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1 x 1 x 4 inches; 1.25 Ounces', 'UPC': '787421301854'} Review Text: Hyaluronic acid is awesome for your skin. If you don't believe me, then literally look it up. WebMD will state that it helps with joint disorders, eye surgeries, and healing wounds/burns and more.

The big statement here really is that it's very effective for any sort of regenerative properties. The serum is a very good moisturizer, and don't let the word "acid" turn you off of it. It's actually found in high quantities in the skin of a baby, which everyone knows is incredibly soft.

This product, applied to your face, will protect it from UV damage, improve elasticity, make your face feel softer, and properly moisturize it.

I have ben using products by Derma- nu for a while and this is my second buy of this serum. Do proper research before you buy products that you're going to put on your face to be seen everyday. I did, and I found this reliable product. The greatest thing is that it works with almost every skin type be it oily, dry, or combination. This is terrific because my skin is very, very combination and while parts of my face are dry, some are a little more oily. This balanced everything out very nicely , that's why I am getting the second bottle of the same one.
As they stated that "This Formula Has Been Infused with Vitamin C + Vitamin E + Green Tea Extract For Their Superior Anti Aging Benefits". I used to make my own masks with vitamin E, green tea and many other ingredients but it just takes too much time to mix it yourself. I alternate this serum with Derma-nu other serum to balance it. My skin is visibly better now.

If you're on the fence, just buy it anyway. It's not expensive for what it does, and if you don't like it just get your money back with the 100% guarantee. You probably won't just like it...you'll love it. I was given an opportunity to obtain this product to test and review. Review Title: Second bottle of this serum Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Eyelash Growth Serum for Long Eyelashes From Uptown Cosmeceuticals Contains Stem Cell & Myristoyl Pentapeptide-17, Dermatologist Lab Tested Lash & Eyebrow Growth Formula, 4 Months Supply, 3.5ml Review Date: 2015/12/06 Store: Uptown Cosmeceuticals Average Rating: 3.1 Product Details: {'Color': 'Multicolor', 'Brand': 'Uptown Cosmeceuticals', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Type': 'Box', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '5 x 3 x 0.7 inches; 0.35 Ounces', 'UPC': '685987989168', 'Manufacturer': 'RightChoiceMarket'} Review Text: I already wrote a nice review about the product and the great customer service I received from Uptown. Be careful with the thin applicator because it might be runny and don't pock yourself in the eye! My Eye lushes got thicker but not longer yet. Takes time Review Title: Takes time to be precise with your eylashes Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Retinol 2.5% Cream From Majestic Pure for Face and Eye Area Will Nourish Your Skin, Potent Anti Aging Formula Reduces Wrinkles, Stretch Marks & Redness, 50ml Review Date: 2015/12/22 Store: MAJESTIC PURE Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'MAJESTIC PURE', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '3.3 x 2.9 x 2.4 inches; 5.6 Ounces', 'UPC': '784190666689 684758988935'} Review Text: I got this product for my friend and that's what she wrote to me after trying it:
"I've been using this for over 2 weeks now. My skin is soft, supple & hydrated, also appears plumper with fine lines much softer. My skin has a glow about it. I am also using a serum underneath this daily. Highly recommend Majestic Pure products & am using a number of them. Does not leave skin dry." She is in her 60th. I also suggested her to use sunscreen: after applying retinol your skin is more sensitive to sun. I received this cream discounted during promo period to test and review. Review Title: Majestic is magical Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Mererke_Pretty Nurtured Argan Oil (1.7oz) Review Date: 2015/12/24 Store: Mererke_Pretty Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6 x 1.4 x 1.3 inches; 4 Ounces', 'UPC': '646437034531'} Review Text: My middle daughter has thicker hair, so I use this product on her. After she washes her hair she applies this serum. Her hair have 3 colors in them naturally, darker brown, lighter brown and red. When she applies this oil her classmates thought that she dyed her hair! It just bring so much shine and compliment her hair. After seeing that effect I applied it on my fine hair. I have highlights. It brings the different color in my hair as well. My co-workers thought that I just visited a hairdresser. So, I would suggest it for anyone. I do not use conditioner when I use the product. I received this serum discounted during promo period to test and review. Review Title: This serum compliments your hair color Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Eye Diamond Smooth and Firm Eye Cream: 100% All-Natural Anti-Aging Eye Serum – Get Rid of Wrinkles – Eye Cream for Dark Circles and Puffiness, Crows Feet and Fine Lines – 100% Guarantee Review Date: 2015/12/26 Average Rating: 3.0 Product Details: {'Skin Type': 'All', 'Product Benefits': 'Anti-Aging', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.4 x 1.1 x 1.1 inches; 0.35 Ounces', 'UPC': '700461602026'} Review Text: I love this product. I just turned 42 and started noticing some more changes in my skin texture and pore size. I've had this product for about 2 weeks and noticed a positive change in the appearance of my skin around my eyes within a week. I didn't experience any burning or stinging. I use two times/day. My skin is sensitive and I find that some products don't work the same for me as others. However, this product to works great for me. I love it! My skin looks like it did five years ago. I am going to stick with this brand for a while. I purchased it discounted to test and review Review Title: Diamond in the rough Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: reBROW - Best Eyebrow Thickener - Eyebrow Enhancing Serum & Conditioner For Longer, Thicker & Fuller Brows. Made in Los Angeles, CA With Advanced Peptide Molecule Technology. Review Date: 2016/01/03 Store: reBROW Average Rating: 3.2 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.1 x 0.8 x 0.8 inches; 0.8 Ounces', 'UPC': '794168070448 636045986988'} Review Text: My mother's eye brows are thinning and this thickener was a magic!! She has naturally thin eyebrows and hasn't gotten into the whole eyebrow makeup trends, but she always wanted fuller brows for a while. She put this on her brows at night after cleansing and she could tell the difference after day 3. She has been using it for about two weeks now and her brows are fuller than ever!It looks like it will last a while, also. It's worth it for brows, unsure about lashes because she has naturally full, long lashes.I was provided this product at a reduced price to complete and post a factual review without compensation. Positive reviews are earned only through positive product attributes and performance. Review Title: Nicer eye brows Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Manicure Pedicure Set Nail Clippers - 12 Piece Stainless Steel Manicure Kit - tools for nail, Cutter Kits Includes Cuticle Remover with Portable Travel Case Review Date: 2016/01/03 Store: Beauty Bon Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.1 x 4.1 x 0.9 inches; 8 Ounces', 'UPC': '678542942449'} Review Text: It is a beautifully designed, tasteful pouch. However, it arrived missing 1 item (not sure which one) and it was stack together because of so many items. It is lightweight and does not do heavy duty work. I like all the instruments, though. I enjoy myself taking care of my nails. I ordered 2 pouches: one for myself and one for my mom. Her arrived just fine and was not missing anything.I was provided this product at a reduced price to complete and post a factual review without compensation. Positive reviews are earned only through positive product attributes and performance. Review Title: Presents for myself and my mom Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Moroccan Argan Oil Shampoo, 8 Fl Oz - Smooths and Repairs - Sulfate Free - Natural - Imported from Morocco by Pure Body Naturals Review Date: 2016/01/26 Store: Pure Body Naturals Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Pure Body Naturals', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Hair Type': 'All, Color Treated', 'Scent': 'Coconut', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3.9 x 5.91 x 5.91 inches; 8 Ounces', 'UPC': '646437736398 646437319751'} Review Text: I've bought from Pure body Naturals before. They make good quality products. In hair products you can trust them. This shampoo arrived very quickly. It is a large bottle. My whole family loves it. It is all natural and sulfate-free.it helps us to prevent itchy skin and dandruff in winter. Good list of ingredients It makes my fine hair to be more workable.Nice light smell. Last long time, too. I was provided this product at a reduced price to complete and post a factual review without compensation. Positive reviews are earned only through positive product attributes and performance. Review Title: Decent shampoo Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Organic Tea Tree Oil Conditioner : #1 with Tea Tree Oil, Argan Oil and Coconut Oil 3-in-1 Formula by Keeva - 100% Natural Ingredients - Perfect for Moisturizing Damaged, Dry, Curly, Color Treated Hair Review Date: 2016/04/09 Store: Keeva Organics Average Rating: 3.2 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Keeva Organics', 'Material Feature': 'Organic, Natural', 'Hair Type': 'Color Treated, Dry, Curly, Damaged', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '27.2 Fl Oz', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '5 x 2.5 x 5 inches; 1.7 Pounds', 'UPC': '641938999600'} Review Text: I tend to have hair a little on the dry side but they are fine in texture s applying a conditioner for too long makes them be too soft. So, I use hair Kleeva conditioner first, then in a few minutes I wash it with Kleeva shampoo. Works much better than doing it other way. My family and I use more conditioner then we do shampoo in winter time. We use it to not only moisturize our hair but make it silky smooth so that there are no tangles and brushes slide right through. The first thing I noticed about our new conditioner was the nice bottle and great smell. Even though the ingredient list was confusing, I really liked the quality of the conditioner.

This conditioner helps to restore your hairs strength. I have been using about a dab the size of a less than a quarter in my hand and that is plenty enough to do my entire head. I have short hair. My kids have long hair. My oldest daughter uses flat iron. this conditioner helps her to keep her hair protected and shiny. I was provided this conditioner at discounted price to test and review. All opinions are my own. Review Title: Helps to protect hair Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Exfoliating Grapefruit Body Scrub for Face and Body Exfoliating Scrub for Acne and Inflammation, 12 Ounce by Pure Body Naturals Review Date: 2016/07/02 Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Product Benefits': 'Brightening', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Special Feature': 'Exfoliating', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '3.4 x 3 x 2.6 inches; 13.76 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'Grapefruit Facial Scrub', 'UPC': '646437736305'} Review Text: I tried several products from this company. Pure body have a nice line of products. I love scrubs with different ingredients, I use grapefrut scent in the morning. The scent is all natural, which is a huge deal for me because any chemical scent gives me a headache. I have enjoyed every single product from them I have bought and I use them every day. I love that this body scrub exfoliates my skin without removing all the moisture. It lives my skin very smooth , like after day at the spa. What is does for me is helps me with exfoliating my skin. Here how I work with it: I scrub my cellulite areas with this product. I also add some body wash to the scrub in order for me to make my job of ''scrubbing'' easier. Then I use cellulite cream. Then, I apply a homemade wrap with grocery bags on top. Then, heating pad on the low settings, then, my waist trimmer on top. Have it for an hour. While that time I study or sleep. I also drink detoxifying tea during the procedure. After that I wash it all off, then scrub it again with this scrub and apply cellulite cream. I try to eat healthy, too. That's how I get result. Usually, it does not come just from one product alone. This scrub have such a great smell!!! it has a nice jar, too, so you can buy it for a present.
I was provided this product at a reduced price to complete and post a factual review without compensation. Positive reviews are earned only through positive product attributes and performance. I chose the scent because citrus helps me wake up in the morning. Review Title: Wake up and smell the grapefruit Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

prompt:
Based on this purchase history, analyze and summarize this person's genuine preferences and patterns in under 256 words. Think step by step: 1. First, identify consistent patterns in ratings and sentiments 2. Next, observe common themes across product purposes and use cases 3. Then, note recurring quality preferences and price sensitivity patterns 4. Finally, synthesize these observations into core preferences Remember to: - Focus only on keywords and trends supported by multiple interactions - Avoid repeating specific product names or details - Base conclusions strictly on the provided purchase data Here's the purchase data: === Purchase Information === Product Title: Anti Aging Skin Care Serum for Men & Women From Uptown Cosmeceuticals Offers Spin Trap® Intelligent Antioxidant, Advanced Scientific Formula Promotes Younger Looking Face, 30mL Review Date: 2015/11/18 Store: Uptown Cosmeceuticals Average Rating: 3.4 Product Details: {'Product Benefits': 'Anti-Aging', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Brand': 'Uptown Cosmeceuticals', 'Material Feature': 'Antioxidant', 'Unit Count': '1.0144 Fl Oz', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.6 x 1.7 x 1.7 inches; 0.8 Ounces', 'UPC': '685987989205'} Review Text: Since I received this serum with a great discount I shared this skin care product with my friend , so she could provide her opinion.
She used it for several day and that's what she found out:
1. Nice, presentable packaging and good design.
2. Very pleasant scent (citrus and spring flowers kind) very fresh
3. Hypoallergenic (she has EXTREMELY sensitive skin)
4. Her husband tried it and stated that is helped him with pores
I could add to that that the package arrived very fast and even the full price with the discount is acceptable compare to other serums from the mall. Review Title: Quality product for good price Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: InstaNatural Cellulite Cream - With Caffeine & Retinol - Body Firming Solution & Tightening Lotion for Thigh Area, Buttocks & More - No Wrap Needed - Anti Cellulite Control Treatment - 4 OZ Review Date: 2015/11/27 Store: InstaNatural Product Description: ['Reduce Cellulite and Tighten Your Skin With our Retinol & Caffeine Firming Cream As time progresses, both men and women will experience puckering and dimpling of cellulite in the following areas: - Thighs - Stomachs - Hips - Arms - Chest Our Cellulite Cream is packed with antioxidants and moisturizing ingredients to help improve skin tone and texture: - Specialized REGU-SLIM formula that tones, tightens, and improves the skin - Moisturizes and hydrates skin - Contains Retinol, Caffeine, Jojoba Oil and Vitamin E for supreme nourishment With InstaNatural, rest assured you will receive the best customer care and highest-quality Cellulite Cream around. - Premium blend of natural ingredients - 4 oz jar gives you more value for less expense - Made in the USA - Cruelty-Free'] Average Rating: 3.2 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.2 x 3 x 3.2 inches; 6.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '616913954721 852661007238', 'Manufacturer': 'SETAF'} Review Text: To help this cream to work on my abdomen I also purchased detox tea and a waist trainer. I drink my tea, which helps me to get rid of bloating, I apply my Cellulite Cream, let it absorb, then I Put on my t-shirt and put my waist trainer on top. The waist trainer helps to keep my abdomen warm and triggers the ingredients in a cream (caffeine, retinol, Vitamin C as well as many other ingredients) to star working better. That is my personal suggestion and you can apply it for yourself. I also apply it on my neck 2x day as well.
I received this cream with a discount for trying, testing and reviewing Review Title: Vitamin C as well as many other ingredients) to star working better. That is my personal suggestion and you can ... Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Pure Hyaluronic Acid Serum with Vitamin C for Face - Organic Anti Aging & Anti-Wrinkle Skin Treatment - Penetrates Deeply & Activates Collagen Production for a Younger, Firmer & Brighter Complexion Review Date: 2015/12/03 Store: Derma-nu Miracle Skin Remedies Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Skin Type': 'All', 'Product Benefits': 'Anti-Aging', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Brand': 'Derma-nu Miracle Skin Remedies', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1 x 1 x 4 inches; 1.25 Ounces', 'UPC': '787421301854'} Review Text: Hyaluronic acid is awesome for your skin. If you don't believe me, then literally look it up. WebMD will state that it helps with joint disorders, eye surgeries, and healing wounds/burns and more.

The big statement here really is that it's very effective for any sort of regenerative properties. The serum is a very good moisturizer, and don't let the word "acid" turn you off of it. It's actually found in high quantities in the skin of a baby, which everyone knows is incredibly soft.

This product, applied to your face, will protect it from UV damage, improve elasticity, make your face feel softer, and properly moisturize it.

I have ben using products by Derma- nu for a while and this is my second buy of this serum. Do proper research before you buy products that you're going to put on your face to be seen everyday. I did, and I found this reliable product. The greatest thing is that it works with almost every skin type be it oily, dry, or combination. This is terrific because my skin is very, very combination and while parts of my face are dry, some are a little more oily. This balanced everything out very nicely , that's why I am getting the second bottle of the same one.
As they stated that "This Formula Has Been Infused with Vitamin C + Vitamin E + Green Tea Extract For Their Superior Anti Aging Benefits". I used to make my own masks with vitamin E, green tea and many other ingredients but it just takes too much time to mix it yourself. I alternate this serum with Derma-nu other serum to balance it. My skin is visibly better now.

If you're on the fence, just buy it anyway. It's not expensive for what it does, and if you don't like it just get your money back with the 100% guarantee. You probably won't just like it...you'll love it. I was given an opportunity to obtain this product to test and review. Review Title: Second bottle of this serum Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Eyelash Growth Serum for Long Eyelashes From Uptown Cosmeceuticals Contains Stem Cell & Myristoyl Pentapeptide-17, Dermatologist Lab Tested Lash & Eyebrow Growth Formula, 4 Months Supply, 3.5ml Review Date: 2015/12/06 Store: Uptown Cosmeceuticals Average Rating: 3.1 Product Details: {'Color': 'Multicolor', 'Brand': 'Uptown Cosmeceuticals', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Type': 'Box', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '5 x 3 x 0.7 inches; 0.35 Ounces', 'UPC': '685987989168', 'Manufacturer': 'RightChoiceMarket'} Review Text: I already wrote a nice review about the product and the great customer service I received from Uptown. raw_response:
SUMMARY:  
The individual demonstrates a strong preference for skincare and beauty products, particularly those that focus on anti-aging, hydration, and natural ingredients. Their purchase history reveals a consistent pattern of favoring products with added benefits such as antioxidants and improved skin elasticity, often rated positively at 4 or 5 stars. Ratings tend to be lower (3.0-3.5) when products fall short of expectations, indicating a desire for effectiveness and quality.

Common themes include a focus on personal care, especially addressing skin concerns like wrinkles, cellulite, and hair health; products are often used in combination, suggesting a holistic approach to beauty routines. The buyer is attentive to scent and packaging, valuing pleasant experiences during use.

Recurring mentions of receiving products at discounts highlight a tendency towards price sensitivity and discerning shopping, as discounts encourage purchases despite a variety of price points. The favorable sentiment expressed in reviews indicates high satisfaction when quality meets expectations, reinforcing a preference for affordable, effective solutions rather than premium-priced items. Overall, this individual's core preferences suggest a commitment to self-care, seeking quality products that are reasonably priced and effective.

target_interaction.title: Skin food in the jar
target_interaction.text:
The whole summer I was kind of slacking off on my eye cream. Now it is time to re-start on my "beauty regimen" again. I was pleasently surprised that the jar was a decent size, not a tiny one. Here are my pros and cons:
Pros:
1. Ingredients are natural, in harmony with my skin
2. Nice, light smell
3.Only need a small amount, so it will last long time
4. Decent price
5. Improvement in fine wrinkles around my eyes
Cons: none so far. If I encounter any, I will update my review. I have been using it for solid 10 days and now I am sharing the jar with my mom as well. She love it, too. May be i will get her her own for Christmas
target_interaction.title_meta: Anti Aging Eye Wrinkle Cream for Women & Men with Hyaluronic Acid Matrixyl 3000 Complex to Moisturize Your Skin Day And Night – 1.8 Fl. Oz
features: REVITALIZES EYES: Reduce the appearance of dark circles, puffy bags, crow's feet and age-defining wrinkles with Cardea Luxe's soothing anti-aging eye cream. Moisturizes, firms and softens.
BRILLIANT RESULTS: Our powerful, safe and effective, oil-free ingredients absorb quickly into your skin so you can immediately apply your favorite make-up for an outstandingly beautiful result.

YOUTHFUL APPEARANCE: This luxurious eye therapy is effective for both men and women of all skin types and skin tones, rejuvenates at the cellular level, boosting collagen, resulting in healthy radiant eyes
ORGANIC & CRUELTY-FREE: Contains no parabens, sulfates or alcohol, 75% natural & 62% organic. Manufactured to exacting standards in the USA in an FDA registered facility with no animal testing.

GUARANTEED SATISFACTION: We offer our outstanding customer service, which includes our "no questions asked", unconditional 30-day, 100% money back refund policy. CLICK the "Add to Cart" button now to order your Radiance Eye Therapy and beautifully frame your gorgeous eyes.
description: How annoying is it when you wake up in the morning or come home from a hard day's work and look in the mirror and all you can see are dark circles or puffy bags under your eyes? Have you tried other eye creams and still found yourself wondering why you look older than your age? Would you like a simple, effective and affordable way to eliminate fine lines, puffiness and under eye circles? Why look your age when you don't have to? Cardea LuxeTM is a luxurious, highly emollient-enriched organic, anti-oxidant and cellular rejuvenating eye cream therapy that's ideal for both men and women of all ages. You'll be very pleased with the fast-acting, long-lasting benefits to your fragile and vulnerable eye area. Our eye cream has a light consistency that instantly absorbs into the skin without leaving a heavy, sticky or greasy feeling, allowing you to immediately apply your makeup. Our advanced eye therapy has combined age-defying peptides, botanicals, pure plant oils, organic vitamins and minerals, skin boosting and rebuilding Matrixyl 3000 and an ocean-based Retinol, which is a key ingredient for radiant-looking eyes that belay your age. Gradual improvements noticeable after a short time Used twice daily, morning and evening for healing Great for men and women of all ages and skin tones Rehydrates the skin and regenerates new skin cells Protects, tightens and firms delicate eye areas Bonus: Cream can be used on face & neck areas as well Oil and gluten free with a refreshing cucumber scent No parabens, alcohol, sulfates or harsh chemicals Once you've experienced Cardea Luxe's Radiance Eye Cream you'll no longer have to worry about under eye bags, dark circles or wrinkles again - we guarantee it. CLICK the Add to Cart button now to order Radiance Eye Therapy and beautifully frame your gorgeous eyes.
